header.title: Software design and development for digital transformation
header.block1: Sunesis offers full advisory, mentoring and operational support (software development outsourcing) to enterprises in the process of digital transformation.
header.block2: We help companies become or stay exceptional with leveraging new technologies, constant innovating, employing fast development cycles and creating better customer experience.

servicerange.title:
With full range of our services
we fasten your digital transformation

box.tacplan: Digital transformation tactical plan with identified new digital products and solutions
box.dev: Rapid development of new digital products and suggestions

servicerange.body: Based on the strategic digital transformation goals we help enterprises to prepare solid tactical digital transformational plan with identified core new digital products and services. In the next step, we help companies with replatforming existing software that is outdated, we modernize legacy code and rapidly develop new digital solutions based on the cloud technologies.

summary.normal: With our wide-range capabilities, cloud specialization, our own Kumuluz digital platform and agile practices
summary.emphasized: we help enterprises shorten the digital transformation cycle up to 85%.

capabilities.title: Our capabilities
capabilities.intro: We offer a wide range of IT consulting, training and software development services that help enterprises with faster digital transformation, transition to cloud, transition from monolithic to microservice architecture, software modernization and new digital products development.
capabilities.outro: We are constantly developing new capabilities according to new technology trends, emerging technologies, and best development practices, like microservices, blockchain, IoT and others.

certifications.title: Our certifications
certifications.body: We've received several international awards and certifications from global technology leaders like IBM, Oracle, Java Community and others.

servicelist.title: Full list of our services and capabilities
servicelist.desc: Here you can find the full list of our services and capabilities on strategic, tactical and operational level that we offer primary to enterprises in pretension industries like automotive, financial services, energy, government, media, retail and telco.

digital-transformation-services.title: Digital Transformation Services
digital-transformation-services.desc: We offer full digital transformation services from preparing a strategy and tactical plan to identifying and outlining new digital products and services. In the next step we help enterprises to develop new digital products and services and to continuously deliver new and advanced features for their stakeholders.
digital-transformation-services.item-1: Consulting and mentoring for digital transformation projects
digital-transformation-services.item-4: Planning and architecture for digital products/services
digital-transformation-services.item-5: Rapid development and implementation (complete solution) wuth extremely fast time-to-market
digital-transformation-services.item-7: Build-in customer engagement tools - sense your customer needs and respond immediately
digital-transformation-services.item-8: Advanced digital technologies - microservices and APIs
digital-transformation-services.item-9: Continuous delivery of new and advanced features

cloud-native-microservices-apis.title: Cloud-native, microservices and APIs
cloud-native-microservices-apis.desc: Cloud-native application development, microservice architecture and APIs are our core capability and competitive advantage. We help enterprises with transition to the cloud and microservices, including replatforming existing applications to developing new cloud-native based solutions.

upper-left.title: Cloud Native
upper-left.item-4: Config and discovery servers: Etcd, Consul

upper-right.title: Transition to the Cloud
upper-right.item-1: Consulting and mentoring with the transition to the cloud
upper-right.item-3: Skilled for SAP Hana Cloud Platform
upper-right.item-4: Skilled and certified for Microsoft Azure
upper-right.item-5: Skilled and certified for IBM BlueMix
upper-right.item-6: Skilled and certified for Oracle Cloud

lower-left.title: Microservices
lower-left.item-4: Best practices and patterns for microservices
lower-left.item-6: Microservice frameworks for Java (KumuluzEE, Spring Boot/Cloud, WildFly Swarm, Liberty, etc.)

docker-and-kubernetes.title: Docker and Kubernetes et al.
docker-and-kubernetes.desc: We’re experts at modern software packaging solutions that provide predictability, immutability and repeatability of running digital services and solutions, independently of particular infrastructure and without the overhead of running the entire operational system.

integration.title: Integration
integration.desc: With integration solutions we help enterprises to bring all data to one place from any source -  for analytics, smart data, synchronization or other purposes.
integration.item-1: Integration of applications, IoT and back-end systems
integration.item-2: From point-to-point integration to loosely-coupled hub-based integration

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.desc: With the rise of blockchain technology we’ve additionally specialized for the design and development of blockchain applications and solutions. As our contribution to the blockchain world we’ve developed Kumulu.io the next generation API platform for blockchain applications.

javaee-architecture-development.title: Java EE architecture and development
javaee-architecture-development.desc: We offer high quality back-end development based on our extensive expertise in enterprise software development and general software design patterns. We’re specialized for Java back-end development.
javaee-architecture-development.item-1: Extensive, in-depth Java and Java EE expertise
javaee-architecture-development.item-2: Long year experience with most complex Java EE projects
javaee-architecture-development.item-3: Certified for IBM WebSphere and Oracle WebLogic
javaee-architecture-development.item-4: Fully skilled for JBoss and WildFly
javaee-architecture-development.item-5: Migration of Java EE application to the cloud

mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.title: Mobile UX and HTML5 responsive web development
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.desc: Besides back-end development we cover front-end development, based on HTML5 and popular frameworks like Angular and React. We’re also highly skilled in mobile development.
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.item-2: Highly skilled for mobile development: iOS and Android
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.item-3: Highly skilled for HTML5 client-side development
mobile-ux-html5-responsive-web-dev.item-6: Native and hybrid mobile development (Cordova, Ionic)

devops-and-cd.title: DevOps and Continuous Delivery
devops-and-cd.desc:
All of our development processes are based on agile and DevOps best practices and principles, which provides fast development cycles, process automation, easy monitoring of development progress and most importantly continuous releases of new software features.

With living the DevOps and agile culture, we help enterprises to internally establish DevOps environment, best-practices and usage of advanced DevOps tools.
devops-and-cd.item-5: Installation and configuration of DevOps environments

bpm.title: BPM
bpm.desc: We have an expert team for business process management (BMP) with the expertise to identify, analyze measure and optimize processes, including with the development of new process applications and data integration. We’re certified for several BMP suits.
bpm.item-3: Integration process applications with back-end services
bpm.item-4: Highly-skilled and certified for IBM BPM, Oracle SOA and BPM Suite and JBoss jBPM with extensive track record
